idea-plugin.name: Base16 Monokai
idea-plugin.vendor: Wimer Hazenberg (http://www.monokai.nl), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Monokai for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Wimer Hazenberg (http://www.monokai.nl). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
